mapper.select: SELECT OOM.ORD_NO /* 주문번호 */ ,OOM.TMP_ORD_NO /* ec주문번호(가주문번호) */ ,OOM.PAY_ORD_NO /* 결재번호 */ ,OID.ORD_ITEM_ID /* 주문item id */ ,OID.ORD_ITEM_NO /* 주문item NO */ ,CCM.CUST_NO /* 고객번호 */ ,CCM.CUST_NM /* 고객명 */ ,CASE WHEN OID.CHANL_CD IN ('P','B') AND OID.LINE_TYP_CD NOT IN ('01','02','06') THEN OID.EXPOS_PRD_NM ELSE OID.PRD_NM END AS PRD_NM /* 상품명 */ ,NVL(OID.ACCM_GIV_TOT_AMT, 0 ) AS CREDIT_AMT /* 적립금예정액 */ ,TO_CHAR(OID.DLV_PLAN_DT+9/24,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS REQ_SHIP_DATE /* EC배송예정일 필드변경 */ ,NVL(OID.REP_PRD_SUP_PRD_NM, '') AS REP_PRD_SUP_PRD_NM /* 대표상품 */ ,OID.PRD_CD /* 상품번호 */ ,OOM.ORD_TYP_DTL_CD /*주문유형상세코드*/ ,OID.REP_PRD_SUP_PRD_CD /* 몰인몰 업체 상품번호 */ ,NVL(PPM.FRMLES_PRD_TYP_CD, '') AS FRMLES_PRD_TYP_CD /* 무형상품유형코드 */ ,OID.SUP_CD /* 거래처코드 */ ,NVL(OID.LINE_TYP_CD, '') AS LINE_TYP_CD /* 상품타입 ( '11' 수입대행, '12' 배송대행 ) */ ,NVL(CCM1.CPN_TYP_CD, '') AS CPN_APPLY /* 쿠폰적용타입 1:정률, 2:정액, 3:사은품, 4:정율적립, 5:정액적립 */ ,NVL(CCM2.CPN_TYP_CD, '') AS DBL_CPN_APPLY /* 더블쿠폰적용타입 1:정률, 2:정액 */ ,(( NVL(OIPD5.GSHS_GIV_AMT,0)+NVL(OIPD5.SUP_GIV_AMT,0) ) * NVL(OID.ORD_QTY,0) + NVL(OIPD7.GSHS_GIV_AMT,0) * NVL(OID.ORD_QTY,0)) AS CPN_DC_AMT /* 쿠폰할인 금액 */ ,( NVL(OIPD6.GSHS_GIV_AMT,0)+NVL(OIPD6.SUP_GIV_AMT,0) ) * NVL(OID.ORD_QTY,0) AS DBL_CPN_DC_AMT /* 더블쿠폰할인 금액 */ ,(NVL(OIPD4.GSHS_GIV_AMT,0)+NVL(OIPD4.SUP_GIV_AMT,0)) * NVL(OID.ORD_QTY,0) AS AUTO_ORD_DC_UPRC /* 자동주문할인단가 */ ,DECODE( OIPD3.ADJST_DTL_REP_VAL, 'Y',NVL(OIPD3.GSHS_GIV_AMT,0)+NVL(OIPD3.SUP_GIV_AMT,0), 0 ) * NVL(OID.ORD_QTY,0) AS SGPAY_DC_UPRC /* 일시불할인단가 */ ,NVL(OIPD2.GSHS_GIV_AMT, 0) * NVL(OID.ORD_QTY,0) AS FMLY_DC_AMT /* FAMILY할인금액 */ ,NVL(OIPD1.GSHS_GIV_AMT,0) * NVL(OID.ORD_QTY,0) AS INCO_SALE_DC_AMT /* 사내판매할인금액 */ ,NVL(OIPD8.GSHS_GIV_AMT,0) AS IMM_ACC_DC_IN /* 즉시적립할인 내부 */ ,NVL(OIPD8.SUP_GIV_AMT,0) AS IMM_ACC_DC_OUT /* 즉시적립할인 외부 */ ,NVL(OIPD9.GSHS_GIV_AMT,0) AS FORYY_DCCPN /* 연간할인권 */ ,NVL(OID.STD_UPRC,0) - (FLOOR((NVL(OIPD.SUP_GIV_AMT,0)+NVL(OIPD.GSHS_GIV_AMT,0)) /10)*10) + NVL(OIPD11.GSHS_GIV_AMT,0) AS SALE_UPRC /* 판매단가,대표상품 판매단가 */ ,NVL(OID.ORD_QTY,0) AS QTY /* 수량 */ ,NVL(OID.LAST_UPRC,0) AS ORD_UPRC /* 주문단가 */ ,NVL(OID.LAST_UPRC,0) * OID.ORD_QTY AS ORD_AMT /* 주문금액 */ ,PPM.INSTL_DLV_PRD_YN AS INSTL_PRD_FLG /* 설치상품여부 */ ,PPM.RSRV_SALE_PRD_YN AS RSRV_PRD_FLG /* 예약상품여부 */ ,TO_CHAR(OOM.REG_DTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS CREDATE /* 생성일 */ ,NVL(OIPD10.GSHS_GIV_AMT, 0) * NVL(OID.ORD_QTY,0) AS TM_DC_AMT /* TM할인금액 */ ,OID.EC_VALID_DLV_CD AS EC_AVAIL_DEL_FLG /* 배송일안내구분 ==> A:배송예정일, B:배송가능일, C:예약주문상품, D:수입대행상품 */ ,OID.OBOX_CD AS OBOX_CD /* 합포장구분 1:화장품,보석, 2:도서, null:합포장아님 */ ,TO_CHAR(OID.DLV_PLAN_DT,'YYYYMMDD') AS DLV_PLAN_DT /* EC배송예정일 필드변경(PPM.ATTRIB_29 -> OID.REQ_SHIP_DT,2010.07.02) */ ,NVL(OID.OPT_PRD_TYP_CD,'') AS OPT_PRD_TYP_FLG /* 옵션상품유형코드 본품/추가(S:본품, A:추가) */ ,NVL(OID.EC_ATTR_SEQ,'') AS EC_ATTR_SEQ /* 옵션SEQ */ ,OID.ORD_ITEM_ID AS SMTC_ORD_ITEM_ID /* smart4c 주문 아이템id */ ,NVL(OID.DITTO_YN, ' ') AS DITTO_FLG /* DITTO여부 */ ,OID.DLV_PICK_MSG_CNTNT AS DLV_PICK_MSG_CNTNT /* 남기신말씀 */ ,NVL(PPM.RSRV_SALE_PRD_YN, 'N') AS RSRV_SALE_FLG --// 예약판매여부 ,OID.ST_CD --// 주문상태 ,OID.ORD_MNFC_TYP_CD /* [주문제작]주문제작유형 */ ,(SELECT CMM.CD_VAL FROM CMM_CMM_C CMM WHERE CMM.CMM_GRP_CD = 'PRD094' AND CMM.CMM_CD = OID.ORD_MNFC_TYP_CD AND ROWNUM < 2) AS ORD_MNFC_TYP_CD_NM /* [주문제작]주문제작유형명 (공통코드:PRD094) */ ,OID.ORD_MNFC_ORDMAD_REQ_CNTNT /* [주문제작]맞춤제작내용 */ ,OID.ORD_MNFC_YN AS ORD_MNFC_FLG /* 주문제작여부 */ ,PPM.FRMLES_PRD_TYP_CD AS FRMLES_PRD_TYP_FLG /* 무형상품유형코드 S/W 다운로드 상품 구분 Flag */ ,OID.DLVP_ADDR_NO /* 배송지주소ID */ ,NVL(OID.SET_PRD_CD, 0) SET_PRD_CD /* 세트상품 PRD_CD */ ,OID.SET_PRD_NM /* 세트상품명 */ ,PPM.PRD_TYP_CD /* 상품유형코드(S:스타일상품, G,P:일반상품) */ ,CASE WHEN NVL(OID.SET_PRD_CD,0) = 0 OR OID.LINE_TYP_CD IN ('01', '02', '07') THEN 0 ELSE NVL(OID.SET_PRD_ORD_SEQ,0) END AS SET_PRD_ORD_SEQ ,CASE WHEN NVL(OID.SET_PRD_CD,0) = 0 OR OID.LINE_TYP_CD IN ('01', '02', '07') THEN 0 ELSE ROW_NUMBER () OVER(PARTITION BY OID.ORD_NO ORDER BY OID.LINE_TYP_CD, NVL(OID.SET_PRD_CD, 0), NVL(OID.SET_PRD_ORD_SEQ,0), OID.ORD_ITEM_NO) END AS SET_PRD_ORD_SEQ_SEQ ,PPM.PRD_GBN_CD ,NVL(OID.ATTR_PRD_NM, '') AS ATTR_PRD_NM /* 속성상품명 */ ,NVL(OID.REP_PRD_SUP_ATTR_PRD_NM,'') AS REP_PRD_SUP_ATTR_PRD_NM /* 대표상품 거래처 상품속성명 56 */ ,NVL(OID.CHANL_DTL_CD,'PA') AS CHANL_DTL_CD /* 주문상세매체코드 57 */ ,NVL(PPM.DLVS_CO_CD, '') AS DLVS_CO_CD /* 택배사코드 추가 2013.05.08 문주란*/ FROM ORD_ORD_M OOM ,ORD_ITEM_D OID ,PRD_PRD_M PPM ,CST_CUST_M CCM ,CPN_CPN_M CCM1 ,CPN_CPN_M CCM2 ,PRD_ATTR_PRD_M PAPM ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD /* 프로모션MD할인(A01) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD1 /* 사내임직원할인(A02) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD2 /* 그룹사할인(A03) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD3 /* 일시불할인(A04) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD4 /* ARS할인(A05) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD5 /* 쿠폰할인(A06) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD6 /* 더블쿠폰할인(A07) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD7 /* 매체쿠폰할인(A08) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD8 /* 즉시적립할인(A10) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD9 /* 연간플러스할인(A11) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD10 /* 단가조정할인(A12) */ ,ORD_ITEM_PRC_D OIPD11 /* 가격조정(A14) */ WHERE OOM.ORD_NO = #{_c.ordNo[0].value} AND OOM.CUST_NO = #{_c.custNo[0].value} AND OOM.ORD_NO = OID.ORD_NO AND OID.PRD_CD = PPM.PRD_CD(+) /* 배송비는 상품정보를 가지고 있지 않으므로..*/ AND OID.LINE_TYP_CD IN ('00','01','07','11','12','13') AND OOM.CUST_NO = CCM.CUST_NO AND OID.ATTR_PRD_CD = PAPM.ATTR_PRD_CD(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD1.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD2.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD3.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD4.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD5.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD6.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD7.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD8.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD9.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD10.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OID.ORD_ITEM_ID = OIPD11.ORD_ITEM_ID(+) AND OIPD.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A01' AND OIPD1.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A02' AND OIPD2.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A03' AND OIPD3.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A04' AND OIPD4.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A05' AND OIPD5.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A06' AND OIPD6.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A07' AND OIPD7.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A08' AND OIPD8.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A10' AND OIPD9.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A11' AND OIPD10.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A12' AND OIPD11.ADJST_DTL_CD(+) = 'A14' AND OIPD5.CPN_NO = CCM1.CPN_NO(+) AND OIPD6.CPN_NO = CCM2.CPN_NO(+) ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(NVL(OID.LINE_TYP_CD, '0')), NVL(OID.SET_PRD_ORD_SEQ,0), OID.ORD_ITEM_NO

SELECT OOM.ORD_NO , OID.PRD_CD , SUM(OID.ORD_QTY) AS QTY , SUM(OID.LAST_UPRC * OID.ORD_QTY) ORD_AMT , CASE WHEN OID.EXPOS_PRD_NM IS NOT NULL THEN OID.EXPOS_PRD_NM ELSE OID.PRD_NM END AS PRD_NM FROM ORD_ORD_M OOM ,ORD_ITEM_D OID WHERE OOM.ORD_NO = 585940014 AND OOM.CUST_NO = 31701633 AND OOM.ORD_NO = OID.ORD_NO AND OID.LINE_TYP_CD IN ('00','11','12') /* '00' : 본품, '11' : 수입대행상품, '12' : 배송대행상품*/ GROUP BY OOM.ORD_NO, OID.PRD_CD, OID.EXPOS_PRD_NM, OID.PRD_NM

SELECT CCM.CUST_NO ,CCM.CUST_NM ,CCM.SSNO_ECP ,CCM.CUST_EMAIL_ADDR ,CCTD.CNTRY_NO_CD /* 국가번호코드 : 자택 */ ,CCTD.REGON_TELNO AS HOME_REGON_NO /* 지역전화번호 : 자택 */ ,CCTD.TXNO_TELNO AS HOME_TXNO_NO /* 국번전화번호 : 자택 */ ,CCTD.DTL_TELNO AS HOME_DTL_NO /* 상세전화번호 : 자택 */ ,CCTD1.CELPHN_ADM_COM_CO_CD /* 핸드폰가입통신회사코드 : 핸드폰 */ ,CCTD1.REGON_TELNO AS CELPHN_REGON_NO /* 지역전화번호 : 핸드폰 */ ,CCTD1.TXNO_TELNO AS CELPHN_TXNO_NO /* 국번전화번호 : 핸드폰 */ ,CCTD1.DTL_TELNO AS CELPHN_DTL_NO /* 상세전화번호 : 핸드폰 */ ,CCAM.LOGIN_ID FROM CST_CUST_M CCM ,CST_CUST_ACCNT_M CCAM ,CST_CUST_TELNO_D CCTM ,CST_CUST_TELNO_D CCTM1 WHERE CCM.CUST_NO = 31701633 AND CCM.CUST_NO = CCTD.CUST_NO(+) /* 고객번호 */ AND CCTD.TELNO_TYP_CD(+) = 'HP' /* 전화번호유형코드 : CMM_CMM_C.CMM_GRP_CD = 'CST013' : HP(자택) */ AND CCTD.USE_YN(+) = 'Y' /* 사용여부 */ AND CCM.CUST_NO = CCTD1.CUST_NO(+) /* 고객번호 */ AND CCTD1.TELNO_TYP_CD(+) = 'CP' /* 전화번호유형코드 : CMM_CMM_C.CMM_GRP_CD = 'CST013' : CP(핸드폰) */ AND CCTD1.USE_YN(+) = 'Y' /* 사용여부 */ AND CCM.CUST_NO = CCAM.CUST_NO AND CCAM.CUST_ACCNT_GBN_CD = 'GSEC' /* 고객계정구분코드 : CMM_CMM_C.CMM_GRP_CD = 'CST017' : GSEC(GS샵닷컴) */ AND CCAM.CUST_ACCNT_ST_CD = 'A' /* 고객계정상태코드 : CMM_CMM_C.CMM_GRP_CD = 'CST018' : A(활성) */
